Join PGC

If you’re here, then you’re ready to take the next step and become an official Member Organization with the Portland Geek Council! There are two steps to applying: the Online Membership Application, and your Dues Payment.

Application & Dues Payment

Annual membership dues for the PGC are based on the size of the organization. When signing up for annual dues payment, just select the payment level for your group, based on the number of (decision-making) persons in your organization.

Annual Dues Level
Name of Organization

Want to be a part of the geeky magic? Learn about the benefits of joining the Portland Geek Council, and sign up now!
